code:
---
config:
  theme: redux-color
  look: neo
---

sequenceDiagram
        actor User as User
        participant WebUI as WebUI
        participant Server as Server
        participant Database as Database
        User->>+ WebUI : 1. Access user management page
        WebUI ->>+ Server: 2. GET / users{ }
        Server ->> +Database : 3. Get user list
        Database -->>- Server: 4. Return user list
        Server -->>- WebUI : 5. 200 / {meta, user list}
        WebUI -->>- User: 6. Display user list
        User->>+ WebUI: 7. Choose an account to be deleted
        WebUI-->>+User: 8. Confirm deletion
        
        alt User confirms deletion [Main flow]
            User->>+ WebUI: 9. Delete user
            WebUI ->>+ Server: 9. DELETE / delete-user{user id}
            Server->>+Database:10. Delete user
            alt Can delete
                
                
                Database-->>Server: 11. Return updated user list
                Server-->>WebUI:12. 200 / {meta, user list}
                WebUI-->>User:13. Display successful message
                
                
            else User is deleted [Exception flow]
                Database-->>-Server: 11. User is deleted
                Server-->>-WebUI:12. 403 / {message}
                WebUI-->>User:13. Display error message
            end
            
        else User cancels deletion [Exception flow]
            User->>WebUI: 9. Cancel deletion
            WebUI-->>User: 10. Cancellation confirmed
        end
        WebUI->>-WebUI: 14. Refresh user list

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到   和 Main flow 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 '  和 Main flow'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
